zone.line: the death of a gentleman who was found murdered
here last night.
This answer startled ‸me, But I presently
recovered myself. I was innocent & that could
easily be proved– accordingly I followed my con
ductor in silence & was led to who one of the
best houses in the town. I was ready to sink from
fatigue & hunger, but being surrounded by
a crowd I thought it politic to rouse all
my strength that no physical debility might
be construed into apprehension & or cons
cious guilt. Little did I then expect the
calamity that would in a few moments
overwhelm me, and ‸extinguish in horror & despair
extinguish all fear of ignominy or death—
The sun & ea I must pause for the
scene which I shall now relatefor it requires
all my fortitude & strength to suffer
me to recall the frightful images ‸of the events which in
proper detail to my recollection.

zone.add: I am about to relate in
